Posts.Content: I have had 9 sessions out of 15 RT and am feeling tired, like lots of others. I also have tightness in my chest and it feels very sore as though it hurts to breathe. Does anyone else have this?
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: I have just had session 1 of treatment. I am usually very fit (lots of running and swimming!) but after the treatment felt absolutely exhausted-really achy and tired just like having flu.  Went to bed for an hour and feel a bit better but really odd. I feel such a "lightweight" after only first session!! Is this normal?
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: I am 48 and 4 years ago was diagnosed with breast cancer. I had a total mastectomy and reconstruction but last month was told the cancer had returned. I am shocked and in disbelief. Last week I had a lumpectomy and lymph nodes removed for testing and am awaiting results. How do I cope with the extreme emotion? What happens if it reoccurs a third/ fourth time?
Posts.Title: Reoccurrence of breast cancer
